title: Drawing, "Donald Deskey Office: Ash Tray and Stand", 1930s
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: F.S.D. ASH RECEIVER; center right: MAKE 2.; lower right corner: #6506; dimensions, materials, instructions in graphite
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for ash tray stand. Bowl-shaped tray at top of stand, tubular metal leg, circular base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Donald Deskey Office: Ash Tray and Stand", 1930s.
1930s. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-772.
